ARCHIVE_LIST.BREADCRUMB_DESC: This section shows you where you are in the system and allows you to navigate easily.
ARCHIVE_LIST.FILTERS_DESC: Use these filters to search and find specific patients quickly and efficiently.
ARCHIVE_LIST.SEARCH_RECORD_DESC: Search for a specific patient by their file number.
ARCHIVE_LIST.CLEAR_FILTERS_DESC: Use this button to clear all applied filters and display all patients.
ARCHIVE_LIST.ADD_PATIENT_DESC: Click here to add a new patient to the system.
ARCHIVE_LIST.TABLE_DESC: All patients that match your filters are displayed here.
ARCHIVE_LIST.PAGINATION_DESC: Navigate through results pages when you have many registered patients.

ARCHIVE_FORM.PERSONAL_INFO_DESC: Complete basic patient information in this section.
ARCHIVE_FORM.ARCHIVE_NUMBER_DESC: Enter the patient's unique record number.
ARCHIVE_FORM.FATHER_LAST_NAME_DESC: Enter the patient's paternal last name.
ARCHIVE_FORM.MOTHER_LAST_NAME_DESC: Enter the patient's mother's last name.
ARCHIVE_FORM.GENDER_DESC: Select the patient's gender from the drop-down list.
ARCHIVE_FORM.AGE_DESC: Enter the patient's age and select the appropriate unit: days for newborns, months for infants, or years for children and adults.
ARCHIVE_FORM.AGE_UNIT_DESC: Choose the unit for the age field: days, months, or years.
ARCHIVE_FORM.LOCATION_DESC: Select the patient's state or geographic location.
ARCHIVE_FORM.MUNICIPALITY_DESC: If applicable, enter the patient's municipality.
ARCHIVE_FORM.STATE_DESC: Select or enter the state where the patient resides.
ARCHIVE_FORM.SAVE_DESC: Once all required fields are completed, click here to save patient information.
ARCHIVE_FORM.GO_TO_LIST_DESC: Click here to return to the main patient list without saving changes.
ARCHIVE_FORM.CANCEL_BUTTON_DESC: Click here to return to the main patient list without saving changes.
ARCHIVE_FORM.TOUR_HELP_DESC: Start a guided tour that will explain step by step how to use this form.

EDIT_ARCHIVE.FORM_DESC: Here you can modify the patient's data.
EDIT_ARCHIVE.UPDATE_BUTTON_DESC: Click here to save all changes made to patient information.
EDIT_ARCHIVE.FATHER_LAST_NAME_DESC: Edit the patient's paternal last name.
EDIT_ARCHIVE.MOTHER_LAST_NAME_DESC: Edit the patient's maternal last name.
EDIT_ARCHIVE.AGE_UNIT_DESC: Select the unit for age: days, months or years.
EDIT_ARCHIVE.GENDER_DESC: Change the patient's gender if necessary.
EDIT_ARCHIVE.STATE_DESC: Edit the state where the patient resides.
EDIT_ARCHIVE.ADMISSION_DATE_DESC: Change the patient's admission date if necessary.

EXPORT_ARCHIVE.FILTERS_DESC: Use these filters to specifically select which patients you want to export.
EXPORT_ARCHIVE.STATE_FILTER_DESC: Select a specific state to filter patients by geographic location.
EXPORT_ARCHIVE.EXPORT_BUTTONS_DESC: Here you can choose the export format.
EXPORT_ARCHIVE.EXCEL_BUTTON_DESC: Generates an Excel file (.xlsx) with all filtered patients.
EXPORT_ARCHIVE.PDF_BUTTON_DESC: Generates a PDF file with table format.
EXPORT_ARCHIVE.PREVIEW_TABLE_DESC: This table shows a preview of the data that will be exported with the current filters.
EXPORT_ARCHIVE.GENDER_FILTER_DESC: Use this to filter patients by gender.
EXPORT_ARCHIVE.YEAR_FILTER_DESC: Select a year to filter income.
EXPORT_ARCHIVE.MONTH_FILTER_DESC: Select a month to narrow down the results.
EXPORT_ARCHIVE.CLEAR_FILTERS_DESC: Click here to reset all applied filters.
EXPORT_ARCHIVE.TOTAL_RECORDS_DESC: Shows the number of records that match your filters.
EXPORT_ARCHIVE.RECORDS_PER_PAGE_DESC: Adjusts how many rows are displayed per page in the preview table.

BACKUPS_ARCHIVE.HEADER_DESC: Here you can view and manage all backup files automatically generated when you export data.
BACKUPS_ARCHIVE.SEARCH_DESC: Search for specific backups by file name or applied filters.
BACKUPS_ARCHIVE.STATS_DESC: Summary information about your backups, including totals and file types.
BACKUPS_ARCHIVE.TABLE_DESC: All your backup files organized by date and type.
BACKUPS_ARCHIVE.DOWNLOAD_DESC: Click this button to download any backup file to your device.

CONTRACT_TYPES_LIST.TABLE_DESC: List of all registered contract types.
CONTRACT_TYPES_LIST.PAGINATION_DESC: Navigate between pages when you have many contract types registered.
CONTRACT_TYPES_LIST.PERMISSIONS_DESC: Manage the associated permissions to edit or delete the contract, "No Permissions" may appear.
CONTRACT_TYPES_LIST.SHOW_REGISTERS_DESC: View total records and those displayed per page.

EDIT_CONTRACT_TYPE.UPDATE_DESC: Saves changes made to the contract type.

PERSONAL_LIST.BREADCRUMB_DESC: Indicates that you are on the hospital staff list.
PERSONAL_LIST.HEADER_DESC: Displays the page title and search and registration options.
PERSONAL_LIST.SEARCH_DESC: Search for personnel by name or RFC instantly.
PERSONAL_LIST.FILTERS_DESC: Filter staff by type (Clinical/Non-Clinical), document status, and active/inactive status.
PERSONAL_LIST.CARDS_DESC: View on cards of all personnel showing key information such as RFC, checker number, type and documents.
PERSONAL_LIST.ACTIONS_DESC: Actions available for each staff member: view documents, edit, activate/deactivate and delete.
PERSONAL_LIST.STATS_DESC: Summary with personnel totals, separated by clinical and non-clinical type, and complete documents.
PERSONAL_LIST.PAGINATION_DESC: Navigate between pages when there are many personnel records.

PERSONAL_FORM.BREADCRUMB_DESC: It shows that you are in the new staff registration form.
PERSONAL_FORM.HEADER_DESC: Title and icon that identify the purpose of this form.
PERSONAL_FORM.NAME_DESC: Enter the name or names of the new staff member.
PERSONAL_FORM.SURNAME_DESC: Enter the full surnames of the staff.
PERSONAL_FORM.TYPE_DESC: Select whether it is Clinical staff (doctors, nurses) or Non-Clinical (administrative, maintenance).
PERSONAL_FORM.CLOCK_NUMBER_DESC: Unique number for the staff assistance system.
PERSONAL_FORM.DOCUMENTS_DESC: Here you can upload up to 7 official staff documents in PDF format (max. 500KB each).
PERSONAL_FORM.UPLOAD_AREA_DESC: Drag and drop PDF files or click to select them from your computer.
PERSONAL_FORM.SAVE_DESC: Once you have completed the required fields and documents, save the new staff member.

EDIT_PERSONAL.FORM_DESC: Modify the data of the selected personnel.
EDIT_PERSONAL.NAME_DESC: Edit the staff name if necessary.
EDIT_PERSONAL.TYPE_DESC: Switch between Clinical and Non-Clinical as appropriate.
EDIT_PERSONAL.UPDATE_DESC: Saves all changes made to personnel information.

PERSONAL_DOCUMENTS.INFO_DESC: Read the instructions on the types of documents allowed and size limits.
PERSONAL_DOCUMENTS.COUNTER_DESC: Shows how many documents you have uploaded of the 7 required and the total accumulated size.
PERSONAL_DOCUMENTS.UPLOAD_DESC: Drag PDF files here or click to select them.
PERSONAL_DOCUMENTS.STATUS_DESC: List of documents already uploaded with option to delete them if necessary.

PERSONAL_CARDS.CARD_DESC: Each card shows summary information for a staff member.
PERSONAL_CARDS.HEADER_DESC: Full staff name and action buttons available based on your permissions.
PERSONAL_CARDS.TYPE_BADGE_DESC: Indicates whether the staff is Clinical or Non-Clinical with a distinctive color.
PERSONAL_CARDS.STATUS_BADGE_DESC: Shows whether personnel documentation is complete or incomplete.
PERSONAL_CARDS.ACTIONS_DESC: Compact actions: view documents (PDF), edit, activate/deactivate and delete staff.

PDF_COMPRESSOR.HEADER_DESC: This is the PDF compression page, which allows you to reduce PDF files to less than 500KB.
PDF_COMPRESSOR.DROPZONE_DESC: Drag and drop your PDF files here, or click the button to browse and select files from your computer.
PDF_COMPRESSOR.BROWSE_BUTTON_DESC: Click here to open a dialog and select PDF files from your device.
PDF_COMPRESSOR.SELECTED_FILES_DESC: This section shows all the PDF files you have added.
PDF_COMPRESSOR.COMPRESS_BUTTON_DESC: Press this button to start the compression process for all selected files.
PDF_COMPRESSOR.CLEAR_BUTTON_DESC: Delete all selected files and compression results to start over.
PDF_COMPRESSOR.RESULTS_DESC: Once compressed, here you will see the statistics of each file: original size, compressed size and reduction percentage.
PDF_COMPRESSOR.STATS_DESC: General summary showing total sizes (original and compressed) and the total percentage reduction achieved.
PDF_COMPRESSOR.DOWNLOAD_BUTTON_DESC: Download the compressed files individually or all at once using the download buttons.
PDF_COMPRESSOR.RECOMMENDATIONS_DESC: Read these helpful tips to get better compression results, such as using black and white or adjusting the resolution.

APPOINTMENTS_LIST.BREADCRUMB_DESC: This section shows where you are within the medical appointments module.
APPOINTMENTS_LIST.SEARCH_DESC: Search for appointments by patient name, doctor, or any other relevant data.
APPOINTMENTS_LIST.FILTER_STATUS_DESC: Filter appointments by their status: Pending, Confirmed, In Progress, etc.
APPOINTMENTS_LIST.FILTER_DOCTOR_DESC: Filter appointments to see only those for a specific doctor.
APPOINTMENTS_LIST.ADD_BUTTON_DESC: Click here to schedule a new medical appointment.
APPOINTMENTS_LIST.TABLE_DESC: Here all active appointments are displayed with patient, doctor, date and time information.
APPOINTMENTS_LIST.ACTIONS_DESC: Edit, cancel, or delete appointments using these buttons.
APPOINTMENTS_LIST.PAGINATION_DESC: Navigate between pages when there are many registered appointments.

ADD_APPOINTMENT.BREADCRUMB_DESC: Easily return to the appointments list from here.
ADD_APPOINTMENT.FORM_DESC: Complete all fields to schedule a new medical appointment.
ADD_APPOINTMENT.PATIENT_NAME_DESC: Enter the patient's full name. This field is required.
ADD_APPOINTMENT.SPECIALTY_DESC: Select the required medical specialty. This will filter available doctors.
ADD_APPOINTMENT.DOCTOR_DESC: Select a doctor from the chosen specialty. You will only see active doctors.
ADD_APPOINTMENT.DATE_DESC: Choose the date for the medical appointment.
ADD_APPOINTMENT.TIME_DESC: Select an available time slot. Only the doctor's free hours are shown.
ADD_APPOINTMENT.REASON_DESC: Briefly describe the reason for the medical consultation.
ADD_APPOINTMENT.STATUS_DESC: Select the initial status: Scheduled or Confirmed.
ADD_APPOINTMENT.NOTES_DESC: Add observations or additional notes about the appointment (optional).
ADD_APPOINTMENT.SAVE_BUTTON_DESC: Click here to save the new appointment in the system.

EDIT_APPOINTMENT.BREADCRUMB_DESC: You are editing an existing appointment.
EDIT_APPOINTMENT.PATIENT_NAME_DESC: You can modify the patient's name if necessary.
EDIT_APPOINTMENT.STATUS_DESC: Update the status: Scheduled, Confirmed, In Progress, Completed, Cancelled, or No Show.
EDIT_APPOINTMENT.CANCEL_REASON_DESC: If you change the status to 'Cancelled', this field will appear for you to enter the reason.
EDIT_APPOINTMENT.SAVE_BUTTON_DESC: Save the changes made. If you cancel the appointment, it will automatically move to cancelled appointments.

APPOINTMENTS_CALENDAR.BREADCRUMB_DESC: View appointments in monthly calendar format.
APPOINTMENTS_CALENDAR.PREV_MONTH_DESC: Navigate to the previous month to see past appointments.
APPOINTMENTS_CALENDAR.CURRENT_MONTH_DESC: Shows the month and year you are currently viewing.
APPOINTMENTS_CALENDAR.NEXT_MONTH_DESC: Navigate to next month to schedule future appointments.
APPOINTMENTS_CALENDAR.CALENDAR_DESC: Click on any day to see its appointments. Days with green background have appointments, red ones have no scheduled appointments.
APPOINTMENTS_CALENDAR.LEGEND_DESC: Green: days with appointments | Red: days without appointments | Blue border: current day
APPOINTMENTS_CALENDAR.TODAY_BUTTON_DESC: Quickly return to the current day.
APPOINTMENTS_CALENDAR.APPOINTMENTS_LIST_DESC: Here the appointments of the selected day are shown with their corresponding status.
APPOINTMENTS_CALENDAR.ADD_BUTTON_DESC: Schedule a new appointment from the calendar.

CANCELLED_APPOINTMENTS.BREADCRUMB_DESC: This section shows all appointments that have been cancelled in the system.
CANCELLED_APPOINTMENTS.SEARCH_DESC: Search cancelled appointments by patient name, doctor or cancellation reason.
CANCELLED_APPOINTMENTS.TABLE_DESC: Here all cancelled appointments are shown with patient, doctor, date and cancellation reason information.
CANCELLED_APPOINTMENTS.PAGINATION_DESC: Navigate between result pages when there are many cancelled appointments.

COMPLETED_APPOINTMENTS.BREADCRUMB_DESC: This section shows all appointments that have been successfully completed.
COMPLETED_APPOINTMENTS.SEARCH_DESC: Search completed appointments by patient name, doctor or consultation reason.
COMPLETED_APPOINTMENTS.TABLE_DESC: Here all completed appointments are shown with patient, doctor, date and consultation details.
COMPLETED_APPOINTMENTS.PAGINATION_DESC: Navigate between result pages when there are many completed appointments.

NO_SHOW_APPOINTMENTS.BREADCRUMB_DESC: This section shows all appointments where the patient did not show up.
NO_SHOW_APPOINTMENTS.SEARCH_DESC: Search no-show appointments by patient name, doctor or appointment reason.
NO_SHOW_APPOINTMENTS.TABLE_DESC: Here all appointments where the patient didn't attend are shown, with relevant information for follow-up.
NO_SHOW_APPOINTMENTS.PAGINATION_DESC: Navigate between result pages when there are many no-show appointments.

DOCTORS_LIST.BREADCRUMB_DESC: In this section you can manage all doctors in the system.
DOCTORS_LIST.SEARCH_DESC: Search doctors by their name. Search is instant as you type.
DOCTORS_LIST.SPECIALTY_FILTER_DESC: Filter doctors by their medical specialty to quickly find the specialist you need.
DOCTORS_LIST.ADD_BUTTON_DESC: Click here to register a new doctor in the system with their information and specialty.
DOCTORS_LIST.TABLE_DESC: Here all registered doctors are shown with their basic information, specialty, shift and schedules. You can edit or delete doctors from this table.
DOCTORS_LIST.PAGINATION_DESC: Navigate between result pages when there are many registered doctors.

ESPECIALIDADES_LIST.BREADCRUMB_DESC: In this section you can manage all medical specialties available in the system.
ESPECIALIDADES_LIST.SEARCH_DESC: Search specialties by their name or description quickly.
ESPECIALIDADES_LIST.ADD_BUTTON_DESC: Click here to register a new medical specialty in the system.
ESPECIALIDADES_LIST.TABLE_DESC: Here all registered specialties are shown with their status and registration date. You can edit or delete specialties from this table.
ESPECIALIDADES_LIST.PAGINATION_DESC: Navigate between result pages when there are many registered specialties.

ADD_DOCTOR.BREADCRUMB_DESC: You are in the form to register a new doctor in the system.
ADD_DOCTOR.NAME_DESC: Enter the doctor's full name. This field is required and only allows letters and spaces.
ADD_DOCTOR.SPECIALTY_DESC: Select the doctor's specialty. You can add new specialties from the Specialties module.
ADD_DOCTOR.SHIFT_DESC: Define the doctor's shift: Morning (morning), Evening (afternoon) or Mixed (both shifts). This will determine the available hours for appointments.
ADD_DOCTOR.SCHEDULE_DESC: Set the start and end times for each shift. Schedules must be consistent (start time less than end time).
ADD_DOCTOR.SAVE_DESC: Review that all fields are completed correctly before saving the new doctor in the system.

ADD_ESPECIALIDAD.BREADCRUMB_DESC: You are in the form to register a new medical specialty in the system.
ADD_ESPECIALIDAD.NAME_DESC: Enter the name of the medical specialty (e.g., Cardiology, Pediatrics). This field is required.
ADD_ESPECIALIDAD.DESCRIPTION_DESC: Optional field to add additional information about the specialty and its focus area.
ADD_ESPECIALIDAD.STATUS_DESC: Activate or deactivate the specialty. Only active specialties will be available to assign to doctors.
ADD_ESPECIALIDAD.SAVE_DESC: Click here to save the new specialty. Make sure to enter at least the name before saving.
